alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Garfield; Holt; Loup; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 7:25PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong winds will impact portions of Rock, northern Loup, Brown, northwestern Garfield, western Holt, and northern Blaine Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 723 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong winds on the leading edge of an area of rain, extending from near Ainsworth to near Purdum. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ainsworth, Bassett, Brewster, Atkinson, Stuart, Long Pine, Newport, Johnstown, Rose, Hofeld Lake, Fox Bayou, Raven, Almeria Meadow State Wildlife Management Area, Hawley Flats, Twin Lakes State Wildlife Management Area, Willow Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Carson Lake, Duff, Koshopah and Pine Glen State Wildlife Refuge. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 135 and 206. Highway 20 between mile markers 230 and 293. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Brown; Garfield; Holt; Loup; Rock
